title: ISic003069. I.Sicily inscription 003069
body:
Facsimile Images

[---]ου ( vac. 1) καλ
[---]τες εἰς

Apparatus criticus

Text after Manganaro 1990

translation

commentary

Manganaro 1990: 407 suggests that the final three letters of line 1, following the vacat, are a demotic-type abbreviation, as found in other Hellenistic epigraphy in Sicily

bibliography

  • 40.0805 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000796
  • Manganaro 1990 407 and tav.LXXXIV https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001412
